snippet: In this novel, an affluent Manhattan therapist who writes a book about women who make bad choices is bitten by her own.
abstract: Susan Dominus reviews book You Should Have Known by Jean Hanff Korelitz.
lead_paragraph: In this novel, an affluent Manhattan therapist who writes a book about women who make bad choices is bitten by her own.

headline.seo: ‘You Should Have Known,’ by Jean Hanff Korelitz
